Simply click on the table which you want to make the order for and you will be redirected to the order screen.
Tables\' status change automatically when the order is taken (yellow color) and then when the order is delivered (green color) and finally back to grey when the table has no active customers.
A notification will appear on your phone screen letting you know which order is ready to be served.

Well thats unfortunate!\nDon\'t worry you can still use the same account just click the option "Leave workspace" in your settings and you will be redirected to a new page where you can join your new store that you are working.
You can add tables by going to Table layout and clicking the rounded button at bottom right of your screen.
You can add your store\'s menu by adding different categories using the rounded button and then click + on each category to add items into it.
Currently employees can join by entering the store\'s password so to invite an employee tell them the password and they will be able to join.
You can kick employees out of the store anytime in the manage staff page. You can see a full list of who is working for you and the date they joined
Changing store settings is available in your settings page. Currently you can change your store\'s name, enter code and currency
You can contact us through the contact section in your settings.\nWe appreciate your effort trying to make the application better!
When you decide you no longer need the app you can request a deletion of your account by clicking the corresponding row in settings
